50 #ifndef __CPowerBlock_Type224__
51 #define __CPowerBlock_Type224__
52 
53 #include <string>
54 #include <cmath>
55 #include <math.h>
56 #include "lib_util.h"
57 #include "lib_physics.h"
58 
59 struct SPowerBlockParameters
60 {
61  SPowerBlockParameters()
62  {
63  P_ref = eta_ref = T_htf_hot_ref = T_htf_cold_ref = dT_cw_ref = T_amb_des = 0.0;
64  HTF = CT = tech_type = n_pl_inc = 0;
65  q_sby_frac = P_boil = startup_time = startup_frac = T_approach = T_ITD_des = 0.0;
66  P_cond_ratio = pb_bd_frac = P_cond_min = 0.0;
67  for (int i=0;i<9;i++)
68  F_wc[i] = 0.0;
69  }
70 
71  double P_ref; // design electric power output (MW)
72  double eta_ref; // design conversion efficiency (%)
73  double T_htf_hot_ref; // design HTF inlet temperature (deg C)
74  double T_htf_cold_ref; // design HTF output temperature (deg C)
75  double dT_cw_ref; // design temp difference between cooling water inlet/outlet (C)
76  double T_amb_des; // design ambient temperature (C)
77  int HTF; // integer flag identifying Heat Transfer Fluid (HTF) in power block {1-27}
78  double q_sby_frac; // fraction of thermal power required for standby mode (%)
79  double P_boil; // boiler operating pressure (bar)
80  int CT; // integer flag for cooling technology type {1=evaporative cooling, 2=air cooling, 3=hybrid cooling}
81  double startup_time; // time needed for power block startup (hours)
82  double startup_frac; // fraction of design thermal power needed for startup (%)
83  int tech_type; // Flag indicating which coef. set to use. (1=tower,2=trough,3=user)
84  double T_approach; // cooling tower approach temp (C)
85  double T_ITD_des; // design ITD for dry system (C)
86  double P_cond_ratio; // condenser pressure ratio
87  double pb_bd_frac; // blowdown steam fraction (%)
88  double P_cond_min; // minimum condenser pressure (inches Hg)
89  int n_pl_inc; // Number of part-load increments for the heat rejection system
90  double F_wc[9]; // hybrid cooling dispatch fractions 1 thru 9 (array index 0-8)
91 };
92 
93 struct SPowerBlockInputs
94 {
95  SPowerBlockInputs()
96  {
97  mode = standby_control = TOU = 0;
98  T_htf_hot = m_dot_htf = T_wb = demand_var = T_db = P_amb = rel_humidity = 0.0;
99  }
100 
101  int mode; // 1| mode | Cycle part load control, from plant controller | none | none
102  double T_htf_hot; // 2| T_htf_hot | Hot HTF inlet temperature, from storage tank | C | K
103  double m_dot_htf; // 3| m_dot_htf | HTF mass flow rate | kg/hr | kg/hr
104  double T_wb; // 4| T_wb | Ambient wet bulb temperature | C | C
105  double demand_var; // 5| demand_var | Control signal indicating operational mode | none | none
106  int standby_control; // 6| standby_control | Control signal indicating standby mode (1=norm,2=standby,3=shutdown) | none | none
107  double T_db; // 7| T_db | Ambient dry bulb temperature | C | C
108  double P_amb; // 8| P_amb | Ambient pressure | atm | Pa
109  int TOU; // 9| TOU | Current Time-of-use period (0-8, for hybrid cooling only) | none | none
110  double rel_humidity; //10| | Relative humidity of the ambient air | none | none
111  // double f_restart; //11| | Fraction of the hour that the turbine can operate during restart | none | none
112 };
113 
114 struct SPowerBlockOutputs
115 {
116  SPowerBlockOutputs()
117  {
118  P_cycle = eta = T_htf_cold = m_dot_makeup = m_dot_demand = m_dot_htf = m_dot_htf_ref = 0.0;
119  W_cool_par = P_ref = f_hrsys = P_cond = 0.0;
120  }
121 
122  double P_cycle; // 1| P_cycle | Cycle power output | MWe | kWe
123  double eta; // 2| eta | Cycle thermal efficiency | none | none
124  double T_htf_cold; // 3| T_htf_cold | Heat transfer fluid outlet temperature | C | C
125  double m_dot_makeup; // 4| m_dot_makeup | Cooling water makeup flow rate | kg/hr | kg/s
126  double m_dot_demand; // 5| m_dot_demand | HTF required flow rate to meet power load | kg/hr | kg/hr
127  double m_dot_htf; // 6| m_dot_htf | Actual HTF flow rate passing through the power cycle | kg/hr | kg/hr
128  double m_dot_htf_ref; // 7| m_dot_htf_ref | Calculated reference HTF flow rate at design | kg/hr | kg/hr
129  double W_cool_par; // 8| W_cool_par | Cooling system parasitic load | MWe | MWe
130  double P_ref; // 9| P_ref | Reference power level output at design (mirror param) | MWe | kWe
131  double f_hrsys; // 10| f_hrsys | Fraction of operating heat rejection system | none | none
132  double P_cond; // 11| P_cond | Condenser pressure | Pa | Pa
133 };
134 
135 struct SStoredValues // these values are stored from timestep to timestep, only updated when the timestep changes
136 {
137  SStoredValues()
138  {
139  iLastStandbyControl = 0;
140  dStartupTimeRemaining = dLastP_Cycle = dStartupEnergyRemaining = 0.0;
141  }
142 
143  int iLastStandbyControl;
144  double dStartupTimeRemaining;
145  double dLastP_Cycle;
146  double dStartupEnergyRemaining;
147 };
148 
149 class CPowerBlock_Type224
150 {
151 public:
152  CPowerBlock_Type224();
153  ~CPowerBlock_Type224();
154  bool InitializeForParameters(const SPowerBlockParameters& pbp);
155  bool Execute(const long lSecondsFromStart, const SPowerBlockInputs& pbi);
156  double GetOutputMW(void) { return m_pbo.P_cycle; }
157  double GetOutputkW(void) { return m_pbo.P_cycle*1000; }
158  SPowerBlockOutputs GetOutputs() const { return m_pbo; }
159  std::string GetLastWarning() {return m_strWarningMsg;}
160  std::string GetLastError() {return m_strLastError;}
161 
162 private:
163  long m_lCurrentSecondsFromStart;
164  double m_dHoursSinceLastStep;
165 
166  int m_iLastStandbyControl;//=STORED(1)
167  double m_dStartupRemain; //=STORED(2)
168  double m_dLastPCycle; //=STORED(3)
169  double m_dStartupERemain; //=STORED(4)
170 
171  double m_dStartupEnergy;
172  double m_dDeltaEnthalpySteam;
173  double m_F_wcMin;
174  double m_F_wcMax;
175 
176  std::string m_strWarningMsg;
177  std::string m_strLastError;
178  SPowerBlockInputs m_pbi;
179  SPowerBlockParameters m_pbp;
180  SPowerBlockOutputs m_pbo;
181  SStoredValues m_sv;
182 
183  util::matrix_t<double> m_db;
184  bool m_bInitialized;
185  bool m_bFirstCall;
186 
187  static inline double dmax1(double a, double b) {return (a > b) ? a : b; }
188  static inline double dmin1(double a, double b) {return (a < b) ? a : b; }
189 
190  bool SetNewTime(const long lTimeInSeconds);
191  void Step(const long lNewSecondsFromStart);
192 
193  double GetFieldToTurbineTemperatureDropC() { return 25.0; }
194 
195  double f_dh_evap(double dPressurePa) { return 2.36230E+06 - (1.35459*dPressurePa) + (0.00000308492*dPressurePa*dPressurePa);} //Calculates enthalpy of evaporation (J/kg) given an atmospheric pressure (Pa)
196  double f_c_psat(double dPressurePa) { return 4170.46 + (0.000538088*dPressurePa) - (7.73437E-10*dPressurePa*dPressurePa); } // calculates the specific heat of water [J/kg-K] at the saturated liquid state as a function of pressure [Pa]
197  double f_psat_T(double T/*celcius*/) { return 1125.09 - (19.6444*T) + (4.42596*T*T) - (0.0391851*T*T*T) + (0.000965517*T*T*T*T); }
198  double f_hw_psat(double P) { return 229628.719 + (2.78471579*P) - (0.0000111907252*P*P) + (2.12030100E-11*P*P*P); } // Calculates the enthalpy of water [J/kg] at liquid saturation near ambient pressures [Pa]
199  double f_s_hw_psat(double P) { return 779.989872 + (0.00791597131*P) - (3.33033640E-08*P*P) + (6.38602593E-14*P*P*P); } // Calculates the entropy of water [J/kg-K] at liquid saturation near ambient pressures [Pa]
200  double f_rho_P(double P) { return 984.079732 - (0.000307058016*P) + (5.32272340E-10*P*P); } // Calculates density of water [kg/m3] at liquid saturation near ambient pressures [Pa]
201  double f_h_air_T(double T) { return 273474.659 + (1002.9404*T) + (0.0326819988*T*T); } // Calculates enthalpy of air [J/kg] as a function of temperature [C]
202 
203  // The saturation temperture for pressures at the boiler
204  // old equation: T_sat = 450.214 + 2.2691*P - 0.0123064*P**2 + 0.0000302829*P**3
205  double T_sat(double P/*Bar*/) { return 439.486188 + (2.88644991*P) - (0.0243308856*P*P) + (0.000125910226*P*P*P) - (2.66233987E-07*P*P*P*P); /*return value in Kelvin*/}
206 
207  // Added Aug 1, 2011 for Isopentane Rankine cycle
208  // Valid for pressures 1.0 < P < 25 bar. Critical point of Isopentane is T=460.4[K] (187.3[C]), P=33.7[bar]
209  // old equation { return 284.482349 + 0.000208848464*P - 1.58981470E-10*P*P + 6.55241456E-17*P*P*P - 1.01688219E-23*P*P*P*P;}
210  double T_sat4(double P/*Bar*/) { return 284.482349 + 20.8848464*P - 1.5898147*P*P + 0.0655241456*P*P*P - 0.0010168822*P*P*P*P; /*return value in Kelvin*/}
211 
212  // old equation: P_sat = -1551.35 + 9.94705*T - 0.0218711*T**2 + 0.0000165747*T**3
213  double P_sat(double T/*Kelvin*/) { return 1965.19859 - (15.1689701*T) + (0.0452997046*T*T) - (0.000063150801*T*T*T) + (3.54340123E-08*T*T*T*T); }
214 
215  // Added Aug 3, 2011 for Isopentane Rankine cycle
216  // Valid for temperature range from 300[K] to 440[K]. Critical point of Isopentane is T=460.4[K] (187.3[C]), P=33.7[bar]
217  double P_sat4(double T_celcius) {double T = physics::CelciusToKelvin(T_celcius); return (-99.7450105 + 1.02450484*T - 0.00360264243*T*T + 0.00000435512698*T*T*T)*1.e5; }
218 
219  double f_Tsat_p(double P);
220  double specheat(int fnum, double T, double P);
221 
222  void RankineCycle(/*double time,*/ double P_ref, double eta_ref, double T_htf_hot_ref, double T_htf_cold_ref, double T_db, double T_wb,
223  double P_amb, double dT_cw_ref, /*double HTF,*/ double c_p_w, double T_htf_hot, double m_dot_htf, int /*double*/ mode,
224  double demand_var, double P_boil, /*double tech_type,*/ double T_amb_des, double T_approach, double F_wc, double F_wcmin,
225  double F_wcmax, double T_ITD_des, double P_cond_ratio, /*double CT,*/ double P_cond_min, /*double n_pl_inc,*/
226  /*double& fcall,*/ double& P_cycle, double& eta, double& T_htf_cold, double& m_dot_demand, double& m_dot_htf_ref,
227  double& m_dot_makeup, double& W_cool_par, double& f_hrsys, double& P_cond);
228 
229  double Interpolate(int YT, int XT, double X);
230 
231  void evap_tower(double P_cond_min, int n_pl_inc, double DeltaT_cw_des, double T_approach, double P_cycle,
232  double eta_ref, double T_db, double T_wb, double P_amb, double q_reject, double &m_dot_water,
233  double &W_dot_tot, double &P_cond, double &T_cond, double &f_hrsys);
234 
235  void ACC(double P_cond_min, int n_pl_inc, double T_ITD_des, double P_cond_ratio, double P_cycle, double eta_ref,
236  double T_db, double P_amb, double q_reject, double& m_dot_air, double& W_dot_fan, double& P_cond, double& T_cond,
237  double f_hrsys);
238 
239  void HybridHR(/*double fcall,*/ double P_cond_min, int n_pl_inc, /*double time,*/ double F_wc, double F_wcmax, double F_wcmin,
240  double T_ITD_des, double T_approach, double dT_cw_ref, double P_cond_ratio, double P_cycle, double eta_ref,
241  double T_db, double T_wb, double P_amb, double q_reject, double& m_dot_water, double& W_dot_acfan,
242  double& W_dot_wctot, double& W_dot_tot, double& P_cond, double& T_cond, double f_hrsys);
243 
244 
245 private:
246  // moved from static double to member
247  double eta_adj;
248  double T_hot_diff, eta_acfan_s, eta_acfan, C_air, drift_loss_frac, blowdown_frac, dP_evap, eta_pump, eta_pcw_s, eta_wcfan,
249  eta_wcfan_s, P_ratio_wcfan, mass_ratio_wcfan, Q_reject_des, q_ac_des, m_dot_acair_des, q_wc_des, c_cw, m_dot_cw_des;
250 
251 };
